title: Deliverance
description: Evil.That is really the best way to describe Jeremy Stonehart. When he was Stonehart.Is he that anymore? I don't know. As he reveals more and more of himself to me, I start to see a glimmer of the man beneath the surface. I start to understand, in some small way, that even evil comes from a source, from some initial seed that sprouted and took hold of a person's soul.Evil is what Jeremy was. But is it what he will continue to be?I will only find out by sticking to him until the very end. It is my only choice. It is my only option. It is the only way I will get answers, and the only way that I will get...Revenge.
author: Scarlett Edwards
